testcase.name: User can sum numbers
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User can sum numbers Given App is running ... passed in 0.678s When Tap on Digit 2 ... passed in 1.078s When Tap on Sum ... passed in 0.795s When Tap on Digit 3 ... passed in 0.766s When Tap on Equality ... passed in 0.747s Then Result is shown and equal to 5 ... passed in 1.012s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User can subtract numbers
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User can subtract numbers Given App is running ... passed in 1.074s When Tap on Digit 7 ... passed in 0.529s When Tap on Minus ... passed in 0.819s When Tap on Digit 6 ... passed in 0.777s When Tap on Equality ... passed in 0.723s Then Result is shown and equal to 1 ... passed in 0.998s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User can divide numbers
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User can divide numbers Given App is running ... passed in 1.137s When Tap on Digit 8 ... passed in 0.461s When Tap on Divide ... passed in 0.704s When Tap on Digit 4 ... passed in 0.788s When Tap on Equality ... passed in 0.819s Then Result is shown and equal to 2 ... passed in 0.929s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User can multiply numbers
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User can multiply numbers Given App is running ... passed in 0.823s When Tap on Digit 5 ... passed in 0.846s When Tap on Multiply ... passed in 0.722s When Tap on Digit 9 ... passed in 0.780s When Tap on Equality ... passed in 0.782s Then Result is shown and equal to 45 ... passed in 1.002s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User can multiply float numbers
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User can multiply float numbers Given App is running ... passed in 1.599s When Type Digits 3.33 ... passed in 2.533s When Tap on Multiply ... passed in 0.701s When Tap on Digit 3 ... passed in 0.708s When Tap on Equality ... passed in 0.730s Then Result is shown and equal to 9.99 ... passed in 0.963s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User can get square root
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User can get square root Given App is running ... passed in 0.958s When Open advanced operations ... passed in 0.255s When Tap on Square root ... passed in 1.094s When Tap on Arrow ... passed in 0.729s When Tap on Digit 9 ... passed in 1.102s When Tap on Equality ... passed in 0.750s Then Result is shown and equal to 3 ... passed in 0.958s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User can delete digits
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User can delete digits Given App is running ... passed in 1.183s When Type Digits 1234 ... passed in 2.730s When Tap on DELETE ... passed in 0.730s When Tap on DELETE ... passed in 0.760s Then Now on the screen 12 ... passed in 0.684s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User can clear result screen
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: User can clear result screen Given App is running ... passed in 1.788s When Tap on Digit 2 ... passed in 0.384s When Tap on Sum ... passed in 1.241s When Tap on Digit 3 ... passed in 0.847s When Tap on Equality ... passed in 0.809s When Tap on Clear ... passed in 0.858s Then Screen is empty ... passed in 1.218s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
